name: imap_thread
purpose: Returns a tree of threaded message

return.description:
imap_thread returns an associative array containing
   a tree of messages threaded by REFERENCES, or FALSE
   on error.Every message in the current mailbox will be represented by three entries
   in the resulting array:
   
    
     $thread["XX.num"] - current message number$thread["XX.next"]$thread["XX.branch"]
